verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of the sons of Korah. <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H5971>this<s%>, all ye peoples; Give <S%H238>ear<s%>, all ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H2465>world<s%>,
Both <S%H1121>low<s%> and <S%H1121>high<s%>, <S%H6223>Rich<s%> and <S%H34>poor<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.
My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2454>wisdom<s%>; And the <S%H1900>meditation<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be of <S%H8394>understanding<s%>.
I will <S%H5186>incline<s%> mine <S%H241>ear<s%> to a <S%H4912>parable<s%>: I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my dark <S%H2420>saying<s%> upon the <S%H3658>harp<s%>.
Wherefore should I <S%H3372>fear<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>, When <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> at my <S%H6120>heels<s%> compasseth me <S%H5437>about<s%>?
They that <S%H982>trust<s%> in their <S%H2428>wealth<s%>, And <S%H1984>boast<s%> themselves in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of their <S%H6239>riches<s%>;
None of them <S%H376>can<s%> by any <S%H6299>means<s%> <S%H6299>redeem<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, Nor <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> a ransom for <S%H3724>him<s%>;
(For the <S%H6306>redemption<s%> of their <S%H5315>life<s%> is <S%H3365>costly<s%>, And it <S%H2308>faileth<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>;)
That he should still <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5331>alway<s%>, That he should not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7845>corruption<s%>.

For he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2450>it<s%>. Wise men <S%H4191>die<s%>; The <S%H3684>fool<s%> and the <S%H1198>brutish<s%> <S%H3162>alike<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>, And <S%H5800>leave<s%> their <S%H2428>wealth<s%> to <S%H312>others<s%>.

Their <S%H7130>inward<s%> thought <S%H1004>is<s%>, that their houses shall continue for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, And their <S%H4908>dwelling-places<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>; They <S%H7121>call<s%> their <S%H127>lands<s%> after their own <S%H8034>names<s%>.
But <S%H120>man<s%> being in <S%H3366>honor<s%> <S%H3885>abideth<s%> <S%H4911>not<s%>: He is like the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that <S%H1820>perish<s%>.
This their <S%H1870>way<s%> is their <S%H3689>folly<s%>: Yet after <S%H310>them<s%> men <S%H7521>approve<s%> their <S%H6310>sayings<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

They are <S%H8371>appointed<s%> as a <S%H6629>flock<s%> for <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>; <S%H4194>Death<s%> shall be their <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>; And the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over them in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; And their <S%H6697>beauty<s%> shall be for <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> to <S%H1086>consume<s%>, That there be no habitation for <S%H2073>it<s%>.
But <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>; For he will <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H5542>me<s%>. [[Selah
Be not thou <S%H3372>afraid<s%> when <S%H376>one<s%> is made <S%H6238>rich<s%>, When the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H7235>increased<s%>.
For when he <S%H4194>dieth<s%> he shall carry nothing <S%H3947>away<s%>; His <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall not <S%H3381>descend<s%> after <S%H310>him<s%>.
Though while he <S%H2416>lived<s%> he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> (And men <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3190>thee<s%>, when thou doest well to thyself,)
He shall <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>; They shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%>.
Man <S%H120><s%> that is in <S%H3366>honor<s%>, and <S%H995>understandeth<s%> <S%H4911>not<s%>, Is like the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that <S%H1820>perish<s%>.
